name: Foundations
summary: Deep foundation solutions ensuring structural integrity for high-rise and complex infrastructure.

introSection.title: SPECIALIZED FOUNDATIONS
introSection.description: Deep foundation engineering is the bedrock of modern infrastructure. We provide comprehensive solutions to ensure structural stability in the most challenging soil conditions.

services.title: BORED PILING
services.description: Installation of large-diameter piles for high-rise buildings and heavy bridges.

services.title: SHORING SYSTEMS
services.description: Secant and contiguous pile walls to support deep excavations safely.

services.title: GROUND ANCHORS
services.description: Temporary and permanent anchoring systems for retaining structures.

name: Ground Improvement
summary: Advanced soil stabilization techniques to enhance load-bearing capacity and mitigate settlement.

introSection.title: GROUND ENGINEERING
introSection.description: We transform problematic soils into solid foundations through advanced ground improvement techniques, optimizing project costs and timelines.

services.title: VIBRO COMPACTION
services.description: Densification of granular soils to increase bearing capacity and reduce settlement.

services.title: DYNAMIC COMPACTION
services.description: High-energy impact densification for large-scale land reclamation projects.

services.title: STONE COLUMNS
services.description: Vertical inclusions to reinforce soft cohesive soils and accelerate consolidation.

name: Infrastructure
summary: Comprehensive civil works including roads, utilities, and enabling works for mega-developments.

introSection.title: SPECIALIZED ENGINEERING
introSection.description: Enabling works refer to the comprehensive preparation of a construction site, addressing all preparatory needs efficiently and effectively.

services.title: SITE PREPARATION
services.description: Site Fence, Hoarding, Signboard, Port cabins, removal of vegetation and site leveling.

services.title: EXCAVATION AND EARTHWORKS
services.description: Digging and moving soil to create foundations and level the site.

services.title: TEMPORARY ACCESS ROADS
services.description: Constructing roads for machinery and material transport.

name: Marine
summary: Specialized marine construction services for ports, jetties, and coastal protection.

introSection.title: MARINE CONSTRUCTION
introSection.description: We deliver intricate marine structures and coastal protection solutions, working in challenging offshore and nearshore environments.

services.title: QUAY WALLS & JETTIES
services.description: Construction of durable berthing structures for ports and harbors.

services.title: DREDGING works
services.description: Deepening of waterways and land reclamation for coastal development.

services.title: COASTAL PROTECTION
services.description: Breakwaters and rock revetments to protect shorelines from erosion.

name: Equipment
summary: A vast fleet of state-of-the-art heavy machinery available for specialized rental and project support.

introSection.title: HEAVY MACHINERY
introSection.description: Our fleet supports complex construction needs with reliable, high-performance equipment and expert operators.

services.title: PILING RIGS
services.description: Advanced Bauer and Liebherr rigs for deep foundation execution.

services.title: LIFTING SOLUTIONS
services.description: Mobile and crawler cranes for heavy lifting operations.

services.title: EARTHMOVING
services.description: Excavators, loaders, and dozers for efficient site preparation.

name: Consulting
summary: Engineering expertise tailored to solving complex geotechnical challenges before breaking ground.

introSection.title: TECHNICAL CONSULTANCY
introSection.description: Expert engineering advice to optimize designs, mitigate risks, and enhance project value from the ground up.

services.title: GEOTECHNICAL DESIGN
services.description: Optimized foundation designs based on rigorous soil analysis.

services.title: VALUE ENGINEERING
services.description: Cost-saving technical solutions without compromising performance.

services.title: FEASIBILITY STUDIES
services.description: Technical and economic assessment of project viability.
